items.sentence: Tom was infatuated with the girl next door when he was a kid.
Tom was too drunk to drive home, so he slept on Mary's couch.
Tom got very drunk and poured his heart out to the bartender.
Tom fell off the ladder when he was cleaning out his gutters.
Tom got cold when the sun went down, so he put the heater on.
Tom became frustrated when his suggestions fell on deaf ears.
Tom is a moderate drinker, but his father drinks like a fish.
This is considered to be one of the best restaurants in town.
I finally found out what had been causing the pain in my leg.
I haven't yet collected sufficient materials to write a book.
